attributes.action: Call for a vote of no confidence in the current conservative government
attributes.additional_details: We want the current Prime Minister to call a general election and admit he is incompetent and unable to safely navigate the UK through this pandemic.
attributes.background:
Due to a catastrophic mishandling of COVID19 outbreak and failed test and trace system this government must be held to account. 
As healthcare workers we are scared of a second wave of COVID having been burned out and treated appallingly by the government in terms of pay and appropriate safety.
